page.title: 19A Schoolgirl's day
page.content: I always get up at 8.00am except on Saturdays and Sundays.For my breakfast I have Rice Krispies or toast and tea. I go to school by bus. School starts at 9.30 and we usually do maths first. At break time I have 30p for my tuck and I buy 2 bags of crisps and biscuits.I get juice from my mum. After break we do language and some other subjects. Between 1.00 and 1.45 I have a packed lunch of sandwiches juice, yogurt, biscuits and crisps or chocolate.In the afternoon we might get art or netball or football practice. When I go home at 3.30 I change my clothes then go up and meet my sister from her work. After my tea I do the dishes, my homework, and watch television before going to bed at 10.00pm.
